page.title: 09Crops
page.content: Gedney Hill has lots of crops.The main Summer crops are wheat and barley.The winter crops are beet and potatoes. Spring ripens the barley. Mushrooms come all the year round,a man who lives down North Road grows them. The lettuces are grown down West Drove. The main fruits are apples and strawberries,strawberries are picked this year in July because of the rain. Barley comes at the end of July.Wheat comes in August-September time.Apples come around September.July brings spring onions when you go by a field they smell awful. Most people grow potatoes,carrots, onions,brussels etc in their own gardens because it costs too much to buy.
